{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Rock balancing {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Rock balancing Rock balancing or stone balancing (stone or rock stacking) is an art, discipline, or hobby in which rocks are naturally balanced on top of one another in various positions without the use of adhesives, wires, supports, rings or any other contraptions which would help maintain the construction's balance. The number of rock piles created in this manner in natural areas has recently begun to worry conservationists because they can misdirect hikers, expose the soil to erosion, aesthetically intrude upon the natural landscape, and serve no purpose. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rock balancing)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
